name: Dice & Drills
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK game jam. Your health, ammunition and number of new enemies spawned is determined every 10 seconds by a roll of the dice. If all 3 dice produce the same number you get 100 bonus points. Enemies can be killed by shooting them. Unfortunately due to browsers struggling with GLES3 certain particle effects had to be removed.

======= Controls=======

Arrow Keys + WASD: Movement

Space Bar: Shoot behind

The drill can break certain objects

=======Credits=======

Music from: Open Game Art
